span.style: background-color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-size: 36px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 2px; text-align: left; font-family: bebas_neueregular; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.p:
The Project Self-Sufficiency Food Pantry is open to ALL families who need it in this time of crisis. The Food Project - Nourishing Our Neighbors
**The pantry is also currently welcoming monetary donations to purchase food, as well as the donation of non-perishable items such as canned soups and stews; canned fruits and vegetables; fresh seasonal fruits and vegetables; frozen meals; coffee; tuna; pastas and sauces; peanut butter and jelly; toothpaste; shampoos and conditioners; hair care products; skin care products; laundry detergents; diapers and baby wipes; toilet tissue; facial tissue; and feminine hygiene products.
Food Pantry Information
Food Pantry Information - Detailed

p.span:
If your child is feeling stressed, overwhelmed or they just need someone to talk to the 2nd Floor Youth HelpLine is available. See below for contact information or go to https://www.2ndfloor.org/ for more information. - 2nd Floor Youth Helpline
Essential Personnel Childcare Flyer

h2.style: font-size: 36px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: bebas_neueregular; margin: 0px; padding: 10px 10px 10px 15px; letter-spacing: 2px; font-weight: normal;

p.span: We, at Franklin School, will encourage ourselves to be respectful, honest, responsible throughout life, and help others to do the same.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12.8px;

div.p: Welcome to Franklin Borough School! Our school educates students from preschool through eighth grade. At Franklin we strive to provide the best possible educational experience for all students in a safe and nurturing environment where all students are supported. This is possible through the efforts of our dedicated faculty and staff, the hard work of our students and the support of our school parents. I invite you to explore our website to learn more about our school community.
